subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] OVILUS

full_text:

I heard on darkness radio in an interview that Dave had with Bill that
the =
ovilus will only
be available until the end of the year. BIll wants to get =
back into
investigating and research
for awhile. Making the ovilus and the =
other equipment he sells has kept
him really busy.
 
debfransen

__________=
______________________

From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoo=
groups.com] On Behalf
Of Steve Hill
Sent: Thursday, March 19, 2009 11:24 AM=

To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] OVILUS



I personally =
have not used this device, but a close friend and fellow
investigator just =
purchased one. She has used it only a few times but
the results were encour=
ageing. On her first recorded session, when
asking "why are you here", the =
reply that she recieved certainly seemed
relevant. The Ovilus stated " fell=
 running down stairs, broken neck".
Another interesting response from the r=
ecording was in reply to the
question "who are you?" The response from the =
Ovilus was "ghost".
However, she also recieved responses that did not seem =
relevant to the
questions she was asking at the time. She sends me all of h=
er recordings
for review so I will keep you posted on the results. Personal=
ly, I can't
wait to get my hands on one to try it out for myself.
 
Steve
h=
ttp://piedmontparanormalresearch.com/
<http://piedmontparanormalresearch.co=
m/> 


________________________________

From: southgeorgiaparanormal <sout=
hgeorgiaparanormal@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, M=
arch 19, 2009 1:27:03 AM
Subject: [EVP-ITC] OVILUS



hey guys, i've been t=
hinking about investing in an "OVILUS". Have any of
you used one? can you g=
ive me your take on the pros and the cons of this
device? thx! 
SGPI
